programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols new livestock arent potty trained; their sheep hut isnt draining properly and has now been transformed into a Pee Palace. Its late fall and the winter deep freeze is just around the corner, so the family needs to get it fixed fast. The Pols also get a new sheep for their farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol clan gets to work on creating Beths dream garden. To beat the incoming rainstorm, an exhausted Ben works around the clock to finish building the gardens pond and waterfall. Noticing her brother is near his breaking point, Beth plans a special surprise to lift his spirits.

programme.title: Europes New Wild
programme.desc: This stunning six-part nature series tells the inspiring story of the rebirthing of the wild regions of the continent of Europe. A land formerly full of diverse wildlife and contrasting landscapes, Europe was in need of special rewilding teams to embark on a mission to return species to their natural habitat and this series focuses on six regions that have benefitted from the project. The Carpathian Mountains of Romania have seen the reintroduction of European bison while rural depopulation in Spain and Portugal offers up the opportunity to expand the wild nature of the Iberian Peninsula. The teams also look at how bears and humans can live peacefully, side by side and explores the myriad creatures that call the Danube Delta home. The unique culture and atmosphere of Lapland plays host to distinctive wildlife and the Sámi people and a natural balance is being restored to the Balkans.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Land of Extremes
programme.desc: Landlocked and bordering both China and Russia, Mongolia is a land of extreme habitats. From the challenging environment of the Gobi desert situated on a mounain plateau to the vast grasslands of the Mongolian Steppe, from the Altai mountains to the Taiga forest in the north of the country, this land is home to some of the hardiest and most resilient animals on the planet. The show explores the topography these distinct environments and chronicles how the wildlife has evolved and adapted so that they can either live with littel access to water or else become totally dependent on grass for their survival.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Nigel Marven: Wild Central America
programme.desc: Join affable presenter Nigel Marven as he discovers the colourful and varied wildlife of Costa Rica. Meet Scarlet Macaws on the Osa Peninsula, playful Spotted Dolphins in the Gulf of Dulce, a "Christmas Tree" Eyelash Palm Pitviper, baby Leatherback Turtles on Costa Ricas Caribbean coast and a group of colourful kings in the north of the country. All this and more as Nigel meets both locals and scientists keen to share their beautiful country and wildlife with him.

programme.title: Nigel Marven: Wild Central America
programme.desc: Nigel Marven explores the stunningly beautiful country of Guatemala, uncovering a wealth of wildlife, dramatic scenery and ancient Maya history along the way. Join him to see the worlds most beautiful lake, Central Americas most colourful pitviper and incredible views from the top of the Maya world. There are Quetzals, jays and orchids in the cloud forests and venomous lizards in the arid interior. Crocodiles keep watch in the rivers and rare turtles surprise our host.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols rush to prepare for their farms first Michigan winter. The family goes into hyperdrive to fix the pasture fence and finish building the garden hardscape before the first snow falls. Beth is worried about the bees, so she brings in some expert help to hopefully ensure their survival.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its winter on the farm, and the Pols are adding to their flock! The family is bringing in four merino ewes that were recently bred, which means with any luck the farm could be expecting its first lambs come springtime. And as winter fades into spring, the Pols prepare for the new arrivals by building a lambing pen. Meanwhile, Beth checks if her bees survived the winter.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: A land full of extreme environments and teeming with iconic wildlife, Africa holds a fascination like no other continent. This series takes the viewer on a journey from harsh desert landscapes to towering peaks, and from vast, sprawling grasslands to raging river torrents. The three episodes cover the mist-covered jungles and mountains of Rwanda and the great apes who call it home; the largest desert in the world, the Sahara, where the scarcity of water and food make life a daily challenge for the creatures who compete for them; and the cradle of humanity, Ethiopia, a weather-ravaged land full of natural beauty and unique wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: Indias big cats remain the soul of the Indian terrain - acting as charismatic ambassadors for the protection of their ecosystems. In Episode 1, watch the snow leopard guard his kill from an unrelenting red fox and follow the lives of the last surviving Asiatic lions of Gir.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: Compilations
programme.desc: The docs at Critter Fixer lend a helping paw to a variety of canine clients. Fifteen small-town celebrity chihuahuas need updated shots after one of their own becomes ill, an adorable puppy steals hearts around the clinic, and another young dog has an unusually large growth. Dr. Hodges helps an Alaskan malamute get its travel papers and attempts to bring a Pomeranian back from the brink. The docs leap into action, trying to save a canine bit by a venomous snake, and perform an emergency C-section to deliver five bulldog puppies.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: A land full of extreme environments and teeming with iconic wildlife, Africa holds a fascination like no other continent. This series takes the viewer on a journey from harsh desert landscapes to towering peaks, and from vast, sprawling grasslands to raging river torrents. The three episodes cover the mist-covered jungles and mountains of Rwanda and the great apes who call it home; the largest desert in the world, the Sahara, where the scarcity of water and food make life a daily challenge for the creatures who compete for them; and the cradle of humanity, Ethiopia, a weather-ravaged land full of natural beauty and unique wildlife.

programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: Indias big cats remain the soul of the Indian terrain - acting as charismatic ambassadors for the protection of their ecosystems. In Episode 1, watch the snow leopard guard his kill from an unrelenting red fox and follow the lives of the last surviving Asiatic lions of Gir.

programme.title: Wild Cats of India
programme.desc: Masters of disguise, Indias secretive small cats have lived in the shadows of their larger cousins. Follow wildlife cameraman Sandesh Kadur on a quest to uncover the secret lives of these small cats. Watch as a family of jungle cats co-exists with a Bengal fox family, and follow researchers deep into the realm of the rare clouded leopard.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Born in Africa
programme.desc: Born in Africa is a documentary following the stories of newborns in five animal families in the African savanna, from their first steps to the moment they become independent. These little lions, cheetahs, hyenas, meerkats and jackals must face many challenges along the way, as their mothers do everything to protect them in these most vulnerable stages of life. Watch them as they grow and learn how to move and get by in the wilderness in this intimate portrayal of family dynamics in the natural world.

programme.title: Critter Fixers: Country Vets: Compilations
programme.desc: The docs help a rare axolotl that hasnt eaten in six weeks, assist a tiny hamster with an enormous wound, investigate why a cat has become aggressive, perform surgery to fix a dogs hip joint, help a guinea pig with labored breathing, rehab a rooster after an attack, and are honored for their service to the community.

programme.title: Dr. Oakley: Yukon Vet Compilations
programme.desc: Celebrate Womens History Month with a special compilation featuring the brains and brawn behind Dr. Michelle Oakley and her trio of vet assistant daughters. Whether theyre repelling down cliffs to check on golden eagle chicks, examining a rowdy herd of 125 cattle or treating a ferret with a UTI—theres nothing the Oakley women cant handle.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: A land full of extreme environments and teeming with iconic wildlife, Africa holds a fascination like no other continent. This series takes the viewer on a journey from harsh desert landscapes to towering peaks, and from vast, sprawling grasslands to raging river torrents. programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kucēni atrod dinozauru kaulus un nolemj uzcelt dinozauru muzeju. Kad Omars salauž kāju, kucēniem jānodrošina rampas, lai viņš tomēr spētu turpināt piegādāt pastu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vasarā pilsētā ir ļoti karsti un komandas uzdevums ir to atvēsināt ar akvaparku. Kāds viesis sagādā ķibeles celtniecībā, kad komanda būvē spēļu istabu Lūkasam un Lilijai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Šodien būs pirmā skolas diena... Ja Rabla komanda pabeigs būvēt skolu! Bebrs grib visu ūdeni savākt sev, tāpēc komandai jāizdomā, kā glābt Zojas augus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni pielipuši pie televizora, tāpēc vecāki mudina viņus veidot raidījumus. Barbapapas apmeklē evolūcijas muzeju. Programmā: Zemes radīšana, Pirmskembrija perioda zemūdene un... dinozauri!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pēc piedzīvotām likstām Barbabravo vairs nemaz nespēj pārtapt. Visa ģimene dodas viņam palīgā. Barbabravo nespēj nosēdēt mierā un ilgi koncentrēties vienai nodarbei. Barbalala piedāvā iemācīt viņam kontroli. Vai viņai izdosies?

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais un Barbabo uzbūvē milzīgu koka rotaļlietu, ko darbina bio degviela.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Reindžere Roza lūdz Rabla komandu salabot Lāču salas tiltu. Kad remontdarbos iejaucas Ātrmeistars, ķepaiņiem jāsatīra viņa radītā nekārtība un jāpasargā lāčus no ātri tuvojošās vētras... ar tantes Celtnes jaunās Būvētavas Bultas palīdzību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo aizmirsa nodot bibliotēkas grāmatu. Bibliotekārs Misters Stingrais šodien ciemojas pie Barbatēta, tāpēc Barbabo izlemj aizbēgt. Barbamamma grib, lai barbabērni uzkopj savas istabas. Viņi slēpjas, lai izvairītos no garlaicīgā darba.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims izzina Rūkoņtaunu, lai atrastu vietu, kur baudīt jautrību vienatnē.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir mīļa, jautra cūciņa, kas dzīvo kopā ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, mammu un tēti. Pepai vislabāk patīk spēles, pārģērbšanās, ekskursijas un dubļu peļķes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Džordžam ir grūti noturēt savu lielo balonu. Vai kāds pieturēs to, lai tas neaizlidotu uz mēnesi?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pirāte Pepa ar draugiem piepilda dārgumu lādi un aprok to atzīmētā vietā. Drīz vien Pedro jāseko takai, kad viņš saprot, ka kaut ko pazaudējis.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir mīļa, jautra cūciņa, kas dzīvo kopā ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, mammu un tēti. Pepai vislabāk patīk spēles, pārģērbšanās, ekskursijas un dubļu peļķes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs dārzā uzslējis telti. Pepa ar draugiem nolemj, ka tā ir ideālā vieta cirkam. Pepai kļūstot par vadītāju, šovs var sākties!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Tētis ved Pepu un Džordžu uz zivju dīķi, ko viņš apmeklēja bērnībā. Viņš ir pārsteigts, uzzinot, ka dažas lietas kopš tā laika ir mainījušās.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ir mīļa, jautra cūciņa, kas dzīvo kopā ar savu mazo brāli Džordžu, mammu un tēti. Pepai vislabāk patīk spēles, pārģērbšanās, ekskursijas un dubļu peļķes.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa kopā ar ģimeni cenšas tikt uz rotaļlaukumu, bet uz ceļa tiek veikts remonts.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz pelēnam Peresam salabot burvju zobu suku, lai varētu saņemt dāvanu par savu izkritušo zobu. Dora iepazīstas ar kāpuru Karlosu, kurš vēlas kļūt pr tauriņu! Lai tas notiktu, draugiem viņam jāatrod sviestogu cienasts.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad ceļojošā veterinārārste daktere Diva nevar laikā veikt visu Celtnieklīcī dzīvojošo dzīvnieku apskati, Rabla komanda zina, kā jārīkojas. Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

"Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad ceļojošā veterinārārste daktere Diva nevar laikā veikt visu Celtnieklīcī dzīvojošo dzīvnieku apskati, Rabla komanda zina, kā jārīkojas. Lilijas nāriņu ballīte tiek atsaukta, kad sāk līt. Laiks celtniecības risinājumam!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ceļot skeitparku, komanda sastopas ar problēmu. Komanda palīdz popzvaigznei nogādāt savu autobusu pilsētā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rivera grib uzņemt krītošas zvaigznes foto, tāpēc kucēni ceļ observatoriju. Kucēni apmaldās uz dabas takas un rod veidu, kā nokļūt mājās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad komanda uzbūvē īpašu limonādes stendu Lūkasam un Lilija, īgnais Ātrmeistars ieripina to Celtnieklīča ielās. Kāpēc bebrs Krančijs šķērso ceļu? Jo Rabla komanda būvē tiltu, lai palīdzētu viņam nokļūt ceļa otrā pusē.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Uz Padingtonu lielu iespaidu atstāj ugunsdzēsēju runa par drošību. Kad notiek īsta nelaime, Padingtons steidz palīgā. Mateo un Džūdija nodibina slepenu klubu koka mājā, bet liedz Džonatanam un Padingtonam tajā iestāties bez paroles.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ķīmiskas villas padara lauku apvidu rožainu. Barbapapas uzbūvē putnu māju, lai pasargātu sasirgušos putnus. Ieraugot piesārņotu pludmali, Barbapapu ģimene izlemj to uzkopt. No drazām top mini golfa laukums.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni apņēmas sarīkot izcilu šovu! Barbaliba grib uztaisīt vislabāko limonādi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Autokinoteātrī tiek izrādīta jauna Supervāveres filma. Kad Ātrmeistars sarīko kārtējo jezgu, ķepaiņiem jārīkojas, lai glābtu situāciju. Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem spēlē paslēpes, bet lapsa Fredijs ar savu ožu ir labākais šajā spēlē.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa mācās svilpot, kad saprot, ka to prot visi, tikai ne viņa.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Dakteris Kāmis ierodas Pepas grupiņā, lai parādītu bērniem mājdzīvniekus. Bet viens no tiem aizbēg. Truša kundze viņu izglābs.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem un ģimeni gaida braucienu uz pludmali, kur viņi varēs būvēt smilšu pilis, bet, kad viņi ierodas pludmalē, tur ir daudz sniega!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mamma vecvecākiem atdod savu veco datoru. Vai viņi mācēs to lietot?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem un Gazeles jaunkundzi apmeklē poniju Pedro, kas nonācis slimnīcā ar salauztu kāju.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Vectēvs rīko šokolādes olu meklēšanu Pepai un viņas draugiem. Vai sivēntiņi atradīs gardumus?

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Mazulis Aleksandrs ir par jaunu, lai runātu, līdz Pepa iemāca viņam pirmo vārdiņu.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš un Dora dodas uz Banānkalnu, lai nogādātu Isai dāvanu - Zābaciņa apgleznotu puķu podu! Dora kopā ar draugiem rīko dzimšanas dienas pārsteiguma ballīti Garnadzim. Ceļā uz svinībām Garnadzis mēģina nočiept pats savu dāvanu!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu. Barbatēti iesloga zoodārzā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Ceļā uz Parīzi Barbapapas atklāj vislabāko muzeju - Luvru!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Dullo vecāku" galvenais varonis ir desmit gadus vecs zēns Timijs, kurš dzīvo izdomātā pilsētā Dimsdeilā, un tur viņam neklājas viegli. Timija dzīve ir bēdīga, jo vecāki reti kad ir mājās, viņu pieskata Vikija, 16 gadus veca ļauna auklīte, viņš pastāvīgi tiek apsmiets, viņu moka arī skolotājs Krokera kungs. Bet viss mainās, kad viņam uzrodas divi laumiņu krustvecāki - Kosmo, viņa sieva Vanda un vēlāk - viņu dēls Pufs. Timijs apjauš, ka laumiņu krustvecāki noteiktās robežās spēj piepildīt visas viņa vēlēšanās. Tomēr Timijs vēl ir maziņš un reizēm ievēlas ko tādu, kas netīši noved pie nepatikšanām.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabla komanda palīdz Riveram uzņemt daudz fotogrāfiju foto konkursam, uzbūvējot ļoti ātru veidu, kā pārvietoties pa Celtnieklīci. Rabls un ķepaiņi palīdz Karlam pagatavot saldējumu visiem. Ja vien Ātrmeistars viņiem netraucēs...

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz Benijam un vienraga dinozauram Uni atgūt pazaudēto burvju otu, lai Uni varētu atgriezties pie sava mīļdzīvnieka Zaķradža. Dora palīdz rumpulītei Hārtijai, lai viņa beidzot varētu piedalīties Rumpuļu spēlēs.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Nē! Beigas! Barbabravo vairs nav mazulis, viņš ir liels puika!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space
programme.desc: Tims Rekss kosmosā: Tiranozaurs Tims, viņa lielais brālis Tomijs, mazā māsa Tija un labākā draudzene triceratopss Kaja bērnizmēra problēmām piemeklē dinozaurizmēra risinājumus kosmosā!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Vecmamma rāda Dorai fotoalbumu ar putnu bildēm. Tomēr albumā vēl trūkst Fiksadū fotogrāfijas. Dora apņemas atrast un nofotografēt ašo putnu. Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz papagailēnam atgriezties mājās - taču ceļā putnēns nebeidz mēdīties!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni atrod dīvainu alu. Barbaliba stāsta par alām, un par to pārtapšanu. The Barbabērni nakšņo viesistabā. Bailēs no skapī mītošajiem briesmoņiem, viņi izliek ērmotus slazdus, lai noķertu tos.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma svin savas dzimšanas dienas. Barbabellai darba pilnas rokas, pieskatot pārējos. Barbabella pieskata Bali kaķēnus. Viņa baidās, kaut kas var noiet greizi, tāpēc nelaiž tos ārā. Barbamammai jāpalīdz kaķēniem.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Vindzoras parkā notiks ikgadējais jautrais skrējiens, bet Padingtons nav formā, tāpēc Bērdas kundze izlemj trenēt viņu. Džonatans, Džūdija un Padingtons nejauši salauž Bērdas kundzes šūpuļkrēslu. Kā viņi to salabos, lai viņa neuzzinātu?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Kurš grib nozagt Karija kunga augstu vērtēto milzu ķirbi? Izmeklē policists Velss un Padingtons. Parkā ir slidotava, un Grūbera kungs māca Padingtonam slidot pirms ledus diskotēkas. Vai pašam pietiks drosmes kāpt uz ledus pēc kritiena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gabriels rīko Talantu šovu, taču Ātrummeistars izdomā plānu, lai viņš būtu vienīgais dalībnieks. Cetnieklīča svētkos dziedās Sjerra Spīdošā, un vajadzīgi jauni instrumenti.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ar steigu jāuzbūvē liels dambis, kas pilsētu pasargās no plūdiem Fermeri Zoju piemeklē likstas - ražu apēd neatlaidīga vāvere.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons atklāj, ka Karija kunga atvaļinājuma laikā ir laistījis aplamu augu. Brauna kundze grib, lai Vindzoras dārzi mākslinieciski izpaužas. Padingtons nezina, kas ir māksla, tāpēc izlemj noskaidrot, kas viņam padodas.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons nejauši iznīcina vāveres riekstu krātuvi, tāpēc ielūdz savvaļas dzīvnieku dzīvot mājā. Džūdijai uzdāvina spiegošanas komplektu, Bērdas kundze sāk aizdomīgi izturēties, tāpēc bērni un Padingtons izseko viņu ar spiegu rīkiem.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons sarīko Mateo dzimšanas dienas svinības, bet viss nenotiek kā iecerēts. Vai Braunas kundzes klauns izglābs situāciju? Padingtons nejauši spēles laikā atdod Džonatana reto Robotiņa kartīti. Kā viņš to atgūs?

programme.title: Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Bērdas kundzes diena, un Padingtons grib izmantot tortē marmelādi no īpašās burkas, taču neviens to nespēj atvērt. Kā viņš izrādīs pateicību? Padingtons un Mateo nodibina galda tenisa komandu un pārspēj huligānus, lai spēlēt varētu visi.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants

Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Jacks new friend Beef invites him to a sleepover. Jack, a sleepover newb, freaks out over impressing his new friend. // Jack and Lil try to prove theyre the one true local, enduring a series of bizarre quests in the local dive restaurant Dead Eds.

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: Lil and her BFFs Anusha and Debs fight to win the coveted trophy at Hank N Beans arcade.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: When Granny Tentacles goes out for a spa day, Patrick volunteers to watch over her house. In a failed attempt to follow Grannys instructions, Patrick makes his way into her home, then brings Squidina inside too. Between breaking Grannys furniture, tearing out her toilet, and letting a wild animal out of its cage, Patrick destroys the entire house, just as Granny returns home to witness it. // Without seeing him, the Star family obliviously smashes up Plankton, leading him to forget who he is. When the injured, amnesic Plankton is saved and adopted by the Dartfish family, it does not take long for him to teach the overly polite family his evil ways. Meanwhile, Karen searches all over town for her missing husband.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Its a busy day at the laundromat! While Squidward struggles to scrub a stubborn stain out of his shirt, we see other Bikini Bottomites tending to their laundry as well - including Plankton, who is using a washing machine to clean up some laboratory equipment. Turns out, the equipment is covered in leftover mutation formula which causes the washing machine to mutate into a raging monster! After it terrorizes the patrons, Squidwards tough stain defeats the monster and everyone celebrates with a song! // SpongeBob goes to Old Man Jenkins farm and finds Patrick watching over Old Man Jenkins prized worm hog, Beulah... who has suddenly gone missing! Furious, Old Man Jenkins sets out with them to find her. After a long fruitless search, Old Man Jenkins turns on them! SpongeBob and Patrick hide out inside Old Man Jenkins beard, but Old Man Jenkins tries to smoke them out, starting a fire! Just in time, Beulah returns and saves them! She wasnt lost, she took herself to the county fair and won first prize!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Plankton tells Patrick hes his conscience in Patnocchio, then in ChefBob, SpongeBob gets stage fright and has to invent a new persona when Mr. Krabs puts in an open kitchen. 09:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled) 09:15 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled)

programme.title: Wylde Pak
programme.desc: With only a few weeks left of summer, Lil has a genius idea: the family must visit her favorite theme park, Lake World, before Jack leaves! But when they arrive, its clearly less magical than Lil remembered: the fish dogs are droopy, the coaster aint coastin, the all-you-can-eat shrimp buffet is kaput. Jacks more interested in filming the janky park - frustrating Lil, who wants him to enjoy the day with his eyeballs. She consoles herself that the parks BEST ride will make up for the disappointing day. But when they get to where the ride should be, its gone! Devastated, Lil blames Jack for the horrid day, and they get in a bad fight. Back at the hotel that night, still mad at each other, the kids cant help but piece together clues hinting that the Otter Side might still be in the park... They have to find it! The kids must sneak past vengeful security guards and chaotic mazes to find the mythical ride, leading to an adventure neither of them expected.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: After Hazel makes her one-millionth wish, Cosmo and Wanda promise her one rule-free wish as a reward. But when their magic doesnt work, they take a trip to Fairy World to investigate and discover Dev has taken control. Fed up with living in Hazels shadow, hes teamed up with Irep to give control of the Big Wand to anti-fairies and now kids all over the world have the opportunity to grant wishes rule-free. Before Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda can stop Dev, he traps Cosmo and Wanda in butterfly net cages and sends Hazel back home without her fairies to help her. While in power, Dev changes Fairy World to his own image and liking, and even reveals the existence of magic to everyone on Earth. Its total chaos. With the fate of Fairy World on her shoulders, Hazel enlists the help of Jasmine, Winn, Antony, and a few magical friends from past wishes, to rise up against Dev and his anti-fairy forces. Hazel must save Cosmo, Wanda, Peri, and Fairy World, before making a very special rule-free wish.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel and Jasmine have planned their very first sleepover but Dev Dimmadome threatens to throw an even better party! To draw her classmates attention Hazel boasts that she lives in a luxury hotel and wishes her apartment building into The Wellsington Hotelsington Hotel. Now she must balance running the hottest hotel in Dimmadelphia and spending time with Jasmine and Winn before they check out of the friendship! // Hoping to win a class superlative, Hazel wishes to be famous at her school. Father Time cuts her a deal for 1,500 minutes of fame, but Principal Krentz is not happy about Hazels celebrity status and threatens to transfer her if she doesnt stop being a "distraction" by the end of lunch. With tons of time left on her wish, Nick of Time arrives with a solution: if Hazel acts like a New Yorker, her remaining minutes will turn into New York Minutes and pass faster. Can Hazel act New Yorky enough to beat the clock?

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: When Max and Phoebe are due to attend Parent-Teacher night at school, Chloe asks to have her friends over to the house unsupervised. Despite being told no, she secretly invites Jinx and Booch over while her guardians are out. At school, Max convinces a reluctant Phoebe to lead an art demonstration for the parents, under the watchful eye of the schools vindictive superintendent. Meanwhile, Jinx discovers the Air Lair, and before Chloe can offer a good cover story, he assumes evil spies are secretly living at their home, and plan to target the parents at the school that night. Jinx races to the school to stop his imagined threat, disrupting Phoebes demonstration and putting the Thundermans cover jobs in jeopardy.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Devs dad, tech magnate Dale Dimmadome, creates an app designed to track kids wants at the annual Founders Day Festival, but Hazel shows up as an anomaly thanks to Cosmo and Wandas wish granting. Dale programs giant robots to track her down.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Its picture day at school! And on top of that, theyre serving the most delicious pudding at lunchtime! Only problem is, Dev has control of the pudding supply and is hoarding it. Hazel takes the power back by wishing that everyone had an unlimited supply of pudding. Pudding is everywhere and Dev is out of business! But things take a turn when people cant stop eating it and turn into pudding zombies. Now Hazel not only has to save picture day, but also stop a pudding apocalypse! // Hoping to win "Most Spirited Hair" for School Spirit Week, Hazel wishes her hair had spirit! Cosmo and Wanda take this literally and give her hair a spirit, bringing it to life as Diana the Diva! When Hazel and Diana "butt heads" over how best to showcase her, Diana runs away. Hazel chases her all over town but cant catch her. Later, Diana shows up at Hazels school aiming to enter the contest on her own. Hazel must find a way to reconcile with Diana if she hopes to win Diana back and win the contest.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Transformers: Earthspark
programme.desc: Thrash and Robby help Prowl investigate the mystery of who is behind the recent attack on the Autobots. Robbys eager to uncover the truth and return to his regular life while Thrash gets to flex his impressive detective skills and prove his mettle to the Autobots. Together, the trio pound the pavement of Witwicky and wont quit until they find the culprit - but will they succeed before the next attack?

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: As Gil trains for the Deep Waters Challenge, he realizes that Lagoona is actually the right monster for the job. // Skelita learns to honor her Abuela her own way after accidentally ruining her gown for a fashion competition.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Besters record attempt is at risk when Best steals her thunder by being the robot instead of learning the robot. // On a search for the first woodpecker in spring, Best finds that hes in very much in tune with nature after all.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester turn themselves into chess pieces but have to abandon their game to save the sub from flooding. // Bester and Best are tasked with neutralising the enemy agents ransomware for the Bettervale Investigation Bureau.

programme.title: Best and Bester
programme.desc: Best and Bester go on an undercover mission to find out why items of laundry are going missing at the Dry Cleaners. // In an unfortunate case of mistaken identity, Best has been mistaken for the notorious jewel thief, Jimmy Muggins.

programme.title: Max and the Midknights
programme.desc: After battling Fendra, Max is determined to get far away from the evil sorceress, even if it means leading the tired Midknights through a perilous snowy mountain. Unfortunately, this new journey has dire consequences for Max and her friends.

programme.title: Dora the Explorer
programme.desc: Dora is an interactive animated series about the cheerful and enterprising young girl Dora who likes to travel through the jungle of South America with her little monkey Boots. Her father and mother live in the jungle. Dora is curious of everything and wants to know about animals, flowers and plants of the forest. When she travels she always take with her a little back with survival equipment and a singing map.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger
programme.desc: Henry Hart is a normal eighth grade student, with an out of school job that takes him on amazing adventures. His cool part time gig as Kid Danger, takes him on out of this world adventures as the sidekick-in-training to famous superhero Captain Man. They go on bizarre and crazy travels, battling criminals and villains that try to attack his hometown and Captain Man himself. Meanwhile at home, Henry has to stay in hiding, keeping his sidekick job as a secret from his best friends, Charlotte and Jasper, and little sister Piper. What exciting adventures will Kid Danger get up to with Captain Man and will be he be able to hide his alter ego from his friends and family?

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: Kamp Koral
programme.desc: A prequel to SpongeBob SquarePants, featuring the beloved characters as children, spending their summertime at Camp Coral having fun doing typical camp activities like building campfires, catching jellyfish, and swimming in Lake Yuckymuck, causing a bit of trouble and chaos on the side. SpongeBob SquarePants is a ten-year-old with a red cap, goofy and friendly as hes always been. Lets not forget SpongeBobs friends, Patrick, Sandy, and Squidward, whos a bit older than the others and works as a junior counselor. All other characters such as Mr. Krabs, Mrs. Puff, SpongeBobs nemesis Plankton, and Karen are a part of this adventure as well.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Penguins of Madagascar is an American animated television series, a spin-off of the Madagascar films. The main characters are penguins-commandoes: Skipper, Rico, Kowalski, and Private. They pretend to be white and fluffy but in reality are fearless adrenaline addicts and a secret spy team on a mission to protect their home in the Central Park Zoo. The penguins often have to deal with problems caused by their zoo lemur neighbors- King Julien XIII, Maurice and Mort. The penguins thwart any attempts of King Julien XIII to wield the sceptre of the Zoo.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Kowalskis obsession with Doris the dolphin drives him to invent a love ray, the Love-U-Laser. It works like a charm until Alice falls for a trashcan, Julien falls for Mort, and Skipper orders the ray to be put in reverse. Private gets hit by the reverse ray and instantly loathes Kowalski. Matters get much worse as the loathe ray explodes and everybody hates Kowalski! Hes only got one shot to stop being the most loathed penguin in the world. // Told as a courtroom flashback, Kowalski unwisely revives Jiggles in a small, whipped cream-eating version. The little green cubes multiply on impact, however, and are soon threatening to cover the surface of the earth. As the Jiggli multiply out of control, will the team be able to prevent the jiggli-fication of the world?

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness
programme.desc: Po the Panda trains, battles, learns, teaches, stumbles, gabs and ""geeks out"" as the newest hero in the Valley of Peace. Now living in his permanent home at the Jade Palace with the rest of the Furious Five, Po will have to take on new responsibilities and face brand-new adversaries (not seen in the movies) in his continuing education as the Dragon Warrior...for being the Dragon Warrior is not a destination, its a journey (unfortunately for Po, that journey is uphill).

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: After Katara attempts to teach Aang waterbending, she is desperate to improve her abilities. When Katara inadvertently stumbles across a waterbending scroll that can help improve her ability while Aang is looking at a pirates store, she decides to steal it after she realizes that she couldnt hope to afford it; but will she be capable of stealing from the pirates without causing herself and her friends trouble?

programme.title: Top Wing
programme.desc: Canadian computer-animated television series Top Wing presents an exciting story of four courageous young birds, Swift, Penny, Brody, and Rod on Big Swirl Island. They are cadets at Top Wing Academy with the best of the best students and have access to the most advanced technology. By operating different vehicles like a submarine, a boat, a jet or a motorcycle, the cadets learn how to work as a team and are the first to rush to the rescue to those in trouble. Major lessons are learnt with the help of their mentor Speedy. With every new task performed the cadets become braver, stronger and smarter.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
programme.desc: Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated TV series, set in an Asiatic-like world. Some people there can manipulate the classical elements with psychokinetic variants of the Chinese martial arts. Unlike anybody else, 12-year-old Aang, the Avatar and last survivor of his nation, the Air Nomads, is capable of bending all four elements, his mission is to maintain harmony between the worlds four nations. His flying bison Appa and friends Sokka, Katara, and later on Toph, are by his side on this challenging assignment.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Best Laid Plaintains: Its a special day when Bada and Bing get a shipment of delicious plantains to eat. Although they jealously guard the African bananas, King Juliens determined to taste them too. He sneaks into the gorilla habitat while they sleep, and he and Marlene end up eating a few too many for the gorillas not to notice. Like all of them. When they realize what theyve done they head for the hills as fast as their stolen car can take them. Can the penguins calm the savage beasts before they bash the banana bandits? P.E.L.T.: Skippers losing it. His performance on the obstacle course is actually slowing down, so he has to trigger a special fitness test to prove he can still lead the squad. Kowalski takes over as Skipper excuses himself to go on his fitness quest. The brainy bird appears to do a bang-up job in the leadership role - are Skippers days at the helm over but hes too chicken to admit it?

Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic finds himself in a strange jungle world with even stranger tree-dwelling versions of his friends, whom he must protect from a "monster" below. Sonic soon learns not everything is as it seems in the depths of the mysterious Boscage Maze!

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: Sonic is shocked that the Boscage Maze "Monster" is Amy AKA Thorn Rose. Wielding a Paradox Prism shard, Thorn wages war on the tree-dwelling Scavengers. Sonic must save these savage Shatter-Friends from each other to find a way home.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: Kowalskis obsession with Doris the dolphin drives him to invent a love ray, the Love-U-Laser. It works like a charm until Alice falls for a trashcan, Julien falls for Mort, and Skipper orders the ray to be put in reverse. Private gets hit by the reverse ray and instantly loathes Kowalski. Matters get much worse as the loathe ray explodes and everybody hates Kowalski! Hes only got one shot to stop being the most loathed penguin in the world. // Told as a courtroom flashback, Kowalski unwisely revives Jiggles in a small, whipped cream-eating version. The little green cubes multiply on impact, however, and are soon threatening to cover the surface of the earth. As the Jiggli multiply out of control, will the team be able to prevent the jiggli-fication of the world?

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
programme.desc: The Commissioner flips his lid, literally. His toupee blows off and sticks to Maurice, who also gets red cheeks and a skinned tail, all by accident. Julien and Mort chase him with sticks, intent on beating the "monster" stuck to Maurices head. The baboon ladies take Maurice in, protecting and pampering him because they mistakenly think hes a male baboon. Its up to the penguins to get the toupee back and restore it to its rightful scalp. // Shelly the ostrich gets stuck in drying cement and only Rico can save her. Shelly falls for him hard as a result, however, Ricos heart forever belongs to his doll. Shelly swipes the doll and tries hard to win his heart, but Rico doesnt budge and his doll is accidently hauled off in a recycle truck. The penguins give chase but are left hopelessly in the dust. Shelly, wanting to make amends, tosses them on her back and sprints after the truck - can she possibly catch it?

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: Папа попал
programme.desc: Вас приветствует самое весёлое семейное телешоу "Папа попал". По правилам проекта участником шоу может стать абсолютно любой мужчина, у которого есть уставшая от жизни и бытовых проблем жена, а также минимум двое детей. В то время, как супруга уезжает отдыхать на далёкий и красивый курорт, ее муж начинает принимать на себя все обязанности своей благоверной. На протяжении 7 дней папа должен будет выполнять абсолютно все задания и поручения, которые обычно выполняет его жена. Уборка, стирка, поход за покупками, воспитание детей и поддержание уюта в доме - всё это теперь ляжет на сильные плечи украинских пап. Более того, участники шоу должны будут сделать еще и множество чисто мужских работ, которые долгие годы их просили выполнить их супруги. Починить забор, поклеить обои, отремонтировать автомобиль или научить ребёнка танцевать - всё это также ляжет на плечи наших мужчин-участников. Папа может? Посмотрим!

programme.title: СуперЖена
programme.desc: Беспрецедентный баттл за титул суперженщины начинается! Каждую неделю 4 обаятельные и привлекательные девушки будут выяснять, кто же из них достоин звания лучшей жены. С понедельника по четверг дамы будут приходить друг к другу в гости, чтобы оценить хозяйственность, саморазвитие и сексуальность конкуренток. Сжульничать и выставить желаемое за действительное им не удастся, ведь за ними будет наблюдать опытный психолог. В пятницу он проведет беседы тет-а-тет и соберет девушек вместе, чтобы расставить все точки над "i".Хитрые манипуляторши, ведические жены, роковые соблазнительницы, яжматери и боевые подруги… Каждая женщина убеждена, что именно ее модель поведения самая правильная. Но кто же из них может покорить не только сердце своего мужчины, но и впечатлить конкуренток?

programme.title: Female Gaze
programme.desc: Cet episode suit lartiste Gabriela Alatorre, entre le Mexique, Londres et Berlin, dans sa quete pour "habiter limage". Realisatrice et photographe, elle explore lautorepresentation feminine comme un territoire de resistance et de reinvention. Son travail brouille les frontières entre intime et collectif : en se photographiant, en photographiant dautres femmes, en leur apprenant à se photographier à travers des ateliers, elle construit un espace où les regards et les corps se croisent, se confrontent et se libèrent. À travers son parcours, le film interroge ce que signifie reprendre possession de son corps et de son image, se representer soi-meme sans mediation, et creer des histoires qui appartiennent enfin aux femmes elles-memes.
